org.dkpro.core.stopwordremover

Class StopWordSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dkpro.core.stopwordremover.StopWordSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.resource.SharedResourceObject

    public class StopWordSet
extends Object
implements org.apache.uima.resource.SharedResourceObject
    Used for storing stop words in a HashSet. Can be used as resource object in UIMA. Terms in stop word files are converted to lower case.

    • Method Detail

      • addStopWordListFile

        public void addStopWordListFile(String fileName)
                         throws IOException
        Loads a text file (UTF-8 encoding!) containing stop words. Only first word in each line will be taken into account. Everything after "|" will be treated as comment.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to read.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file could not be read.

      • load

        public void load(org.apache.uima.resource.DataResource dataRes)
          throws org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException
        Specified by:
        load in interface org.apache.uima.resource.SharedResourceObject
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException

                 String aEncoding)
          throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • load

        public void load(Reader aReader)
          throws IOException
        Load the stopwords from the given reader. If the set already contains data, new stopwords are added.
        Parameters:
        aReader - a reader.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the data could not be read.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(String aWord)
